snippet: From the archives of The International Herald Tribune: An exhibition of about 800 of the Spanish artist’s paintings, drawings, ceramics and sculptures was announced in October 1966....
abstract: From the archives of The International Herald Tribune: An exhibition of about 800 of the Spanish artist’s paintings, drawings, ceramics and sculptures was announced in October 1966.

headline.main: 1966: Gigantic Picasso Show For Paris Grand Palais
